description: This course on SÃ¸ren Kierkegaard--which takes place in his hometown, Copenhagen, Denmark--moves
through some unusual thematic territory. We examine the dialectic of meaninglessness and faith,
boredom and passion, solitude and silence; we ask about the joy and pain of embodiment; and we
explore forms of love and commitment. Discussions take place in the Danish classroom, but also
on-site in the parks, squares, churches, castles, and surrounding forests mentioned in his works.
